page.title: 13PUPIL INTERVIEW-14yrs
page.content: Marden High School is situated near the coast.It has about 1300 pupils in it. The average age of the pupils is 13.5 years old.The single lessons last 35 mins,there are 8 lessons a day,2 breaks and a 1 hour 10 min lunch break.Their day starts at 8.55am and finishes at 3.45pm.Some lessons are:science, humanities,maths,English and practical subjects. Out of school there are many activities to go to.The girls tended to go to local amenities such as the beach and youth clubs.The Alletsa disco proved very popular. High school is very different from their junior schools due to the changing teachers after each lesson and more homework. The school has a wide range of sports equipment and also there is a wide range of other equipment including
